name: Elegent tutu
description:
This listing is for a custom tutu for the sizes listed below. If you need the size to be larger please look at the other listings. I can also make them longer if you need them to be, BUT please note that there maybe an extra cost for a longer length. 

12-18 months---------------Waist: 16"/Length: 8" 
18-24 months---------------Waist: 17"/Length: 8"
2T----------------------------Waist: 18"/Length: 8-9" 
3T-------------------------------Waist: 19"/Length: 9"

****TUTU SIZE SHOWN IN PICTURES FOR THIS LISTING = WAIST 19”/LENGTH 12” ****

CUSTOMER MAY CHOOSE UP TO THREE (3) COLORS OF TULE FOR THE TUTU. PLEASE NOTE DESIRED COLOR(S) IN THE NOTES SECTION AT CHECK OUT IF NOT NOTED THE TUTU WILL BE MADE IN PINK AND BROWN. ALSO PLEASE NOTE THE SIZE OF THE TUTU THAT YOU WILL NEED. 

Tutus are made with ribbon not elastic.

Larger and adult sized tutu's and outfits are welcome. Please contact me for pricing and a custom listing. Please note that ribbons used may vary slightly based on availability.

*** Please allow a day or two for these to be made before being shipped out***

name: The Jordan skirt
description:
This Playful reversable skirt will fit the needs of your little girl for whatever mood she is in. The skirt is made with two different cotton fabrics with a pink waist band. 
Please look below for the measurements of the skirt, If you would like the skirt to be longer or shorter please contact me for a custom listing and keep in mind that there may be an extra fee involved if there is more fabric needed. Also please contact me for other fabric combos for a custom order.
Also please allow 1-2 business days before your item is shipped

2T- Length 10in/ Waist- 19 in
3T- Length 11in/ Waist- 20in
4T- Length 12in/ Waist- 22in
5T- Length 14in/ Waist- 23in

Pattern provided by Upandawaypatterns on etsy.

name: Chloe Sundress with matching Headband
description:
This adorable sundress will be the talk of the town. The style and pattern are PERFECT for summer. The Headband is made with matching fabric and the elastic is covered for comfort.

Please allow 1-2 business days before your item is shipped.


2 (2T)-length: 19in.

3 (3T)-length: 21in.

4 (4T)-length: 23in.

5-length: 25in.

6-length: 26in

Please contact me for a custom order and different fabric choices.

name: Sadie Drop Waist shirt with a matching headband
description:
This adorable drop waist shirt is perfect with a pair of shorts or leggings. The different color polka dots make this shirt fun to wear. The headband is made with matching fabric and the elastic is covered for comfort.

Please allow 1-2 business days before your item is shipped.
2 (2T)-length: 15 in.

3 (3T)-length: 16 in.

4 (4/4T)-length: 17 in

5 (5/5T)-length: 18 in.

6 (6Y)-length: 19 in.

Please contact me for a custom order and for different fabric choices
